dmca.title: [ABUSE] PLEASE REMOVE THIS LISTING ..... DMCA Notification of Infringement Letter
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 22, 2006 9:37 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] PLEASE REMOVE THIS LISTING ..... DMCA Notification of
Infringement Letter

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Tuesday, March 21, 2006
at
22:44:19 and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to your
team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] PLEASE REMOVE THIS LISTING ..... DMCA Notification of Infringement
Letter

MESSAGE BODY:

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: manismw@redshift.com
  To: support@NameCheap.com ; admins@theplanet.com ; abuse@theplanet.com ;
17fd1dcf4db644689f9ee0540cdcb884.protect@whoisguard.com ;
9dabc502-d38d-4e21-b641-39c207596c84@whois-services.com
  Sent: Friday, March 17, 2006 10:52 PM
  Subject: DMCA Notification of Infringement Letter


  DMCA Notification of Infringement Letter

   

   

                                  Dated: March 17, 2005

   

   

   

  WhoisGuard

  8939 South Sepulveda Boulevard

  Westchester, CA 90045

   

   

  To Whom It May Concern,

   

  I am writing to you to avail myself of my rights under the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). This letter is a Notice of Infringement as
authorized in
